quotes.author: Nick Drake
quotes.quote: Time has told me you're a rare, rare find.
quotes.meaning: Duration reveals exceptional value in relationship.

quotes.author: Bon Scott
quotes.quote: It's a long way to the top if you wanna rock and roll.
quotes.meaning: Musical success requires extended difficult journey.

quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne
quotes.quote: I'm just a dreamer, I dream my life away.

quotes.author: Ronnie James Dio
quotes.quote: Music is a language that doesn't speak in particular words. It speaks in emotions.
quotes.meaning: Sound communicates through feeling, not verbal meaning.

quotes.author: Lemmy Kilmister
quotes.quote: We are Motörhead, and we play rock and roll.
quotes.meaning: Simple direct statement of identity and purpose.

quotes.author: Brian May
quotes.quote: I despise the Lottery. There's less chance of you becoming a millionaire than there is of getting hit on the head by a passing asteroid.

quotes.author: Bono
quotes.quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.
quotes.meaning: Sound transforms society through individual impact.

quotes.author: The Edge
quotes.quote: The magic of playing has to do with how much everyone wants it to work.

quotes.author: Sting
quotes.quote: I don't think happiness is necessarily the reason we're here.

quotes.author: Peter Gabriel
quotes.quote: Self-conscious rejection of the absolute is the best way to resist power and totalitarianism.

quotes.author: Phil Collins
quotes.quote: I'm not a singer who plays drums. I'm a drummer who sings.

quotes.author: Genesis P-Orridge
quotes.quote: Always be original. Never duplicate.

quotes.author: Brian Eno
quotes.quote: Honor thy error as a hidden intention.

quotes.author: Tom Waits
quotes.quote: I don't have a drinking problem, except when I can't get a drink.
quotes.meaning: Dependence defined by access difficulty, not consumption.

quotes.author: Nick Cave
quotes.quote: I'm a believer. I don't go to church. I don't belong to any particular religion, but I do believe in God.
quotes.meaning: Faith exists independently of institutional practice.

quotes.author: PJ Harvey
quotes.quote: I feel like it's very important that I'm doing what I'm doing, and I want to keep honoring that.
quotes.meaning: Artistic integrity requires commitment to authentic work.

quotes.author: Trent Reznor
quotes.quote: I'd much rather have people hate me than be indifferent.
quotes.meaning: Strong reaction surpasses apathy in value.

quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan
quotes.quote: All I can do is focus on staying creative and hopefully helping other people find their niche.
quotes.meaning: Personal growth enables assisting others' development.

quotes.author: Billy Corgan
quotes.quote: I don't have a problem with my body.

quotes.author: Kim Gordon
quotes.quote: Women aren't allowed to be kick-ass.

quotes.author: Thurston Moore
quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no-one is allowed to be magnificent.
quotes.meaning: Music enables transcendence of ordinary constraints.

quotes.author: J Mascis
quotes.quote: It's hard to say how certain stories just punch us in the heart.
quotes.meaning: Emotional impact operates beyond rational explanation.

quotes.author: Robert Smith
quotes.quote: I don't find the technology threatening. A lot of people my age, my generation, find it difficult to immerse themselves.

quotes.author: Simon Le Bon
quotes.quote: I'm an optimist. I'm hopeful.

quotes.author: Boy George
quotes.quote: I suppose there is a lot of toughness in me.
quotes.meaning: Resilience exists as core character trait.

quotes.author: Madonna
quotes.quote: I'm tough, ambitious, and I know exactly what I want.

quotes.author: Cyndi Lauper
quotes.quote: I've always wondered what it would be like if somebody from outer space landed with three heads.

quotes.author: Pat Benatar
quotes.quote: We are strong, no one can tell us we're wrong.

quotes.author: Annie Lennox
quotes.quote: The word feminism needs to be taken back. It needs to be reclaimed.

quotes.author: Sade
quotes.quote: Whatever I'm doing, I'm in that moment and I'm doing it.

quotes.author: Björk
quotes.quote: I'm self-sufficient. I spend a lot of time on my own.

quotes.author: Kate Bush
quotes.quote: I love comedy. I like to think that there's a sense of humor in some of my music.

quotes.author: Tori Amos
quotes.quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.

quotes.author: Fiona Apple
quotes.quote: I got drunk when I was five. Everybody gets drunk before they're 21.
quotes.meaning: Early experience with substances as normalized phenomenon.

quotes.author: Alanis Morissette
quotes.quote: I see the whole concept of Generation X implies that everyone has lost hope.

quotes.author: Liz Phair
quotes.quote: I don't always trust my own instincts. It would be nice if someone else would tell me what I want to do.
quotes.meaning: Self-doubt creates desire for external direction.

quotes.author: Courtney Love
quotes.quote: I'm not a woman. I'm a force of nature.
quotes.meaning: Identity transcends gender into elemental power.

quotes.author: Shirley Manson
quotes.quote: I'm afraid of happy people. They're chemically unbalanced.

quotes.author: Gwen Stefani
quotes.quote: Act as young as you feel. You're not getting older; you're getting more entitled to be your weird self.

quotes.author: Hayley Williams
quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand.

quotes.author: Amy Lee
quotes.quote: I love contrast in music.

quotes.author: Florence Welch
quotes.quote: I've got quite a fragile sense of self-worth.

quotes.author: St. Vincent
quotes.quote: I grew up around a lot of various religions, so it's a part of my consciousness in a way.

quotes.author: Grimes
quotes.quote: I don't think I know anyone who has a steady job in Montreal.

quotes.author: Lorde
quotes.quote: I try to write about small insignificant things. I try to find out what it's like being alive.

quotes.author: Billie Eilish
quotes.quote: I don't know how to function without music.

quotes.author: Taylor Swift
quotes.quote: People haven't always been there for me but music always has.
quotes.meaning: Art provides reliable support beyond human relationships.

quotes.author: Ariana Grande
quotes.quote: I love making music and I'm falling in love with making records.

quotes.author: Lady Gaga
quotes.quote: I'm just trying to change the world, one sequin at a time.

quotes.author: Katy Perry
quotes.quote: Find out what your gift is and nurture it.
quotes.meaning: Identifying and developing talent defines success.

quotes.author: Rihanna
quotes.quote: The minute you learn to love yourself, you won't want to be anyone else.

quotes.author: Beyoncé
quotes.quote: Power is not given to you. You have to take it.

quotes.author: Adele
quotes.quote: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears.

quotes.author: Sam Smith
quotes.quote: I'm not fixed in any way. I'm in a fluid state.

quotes.author: Ed Sheeran
quotes.quote: I can't tell you the amount of times I've been walking down the streets and I'm like, 'It's Ed Sheeran!'

quotes.author: Bruno Mars
quotes.quote: Hawaii is paradise. It sounds cheesy to say it, but there's music in the air there.

quotes.author: The Weeknd
quotes.quote: I'm not a celebrity, I'm just a musician.

quotes.author: Drake
quotes.quote: Live without pretending, love without depending, listen without defending, speak without offending.
quotes.meaning: Authentic relating requires vulnerability and respect.

quotes.author: Nicki Minaj
quotes.quote: I am not a word, I am not a line, I am not a girl that can ever be defined.

quotes.author: Cardi B
quotes.quote: Knock me down nine times but I get up ten.

quotes.author: Megan Thee Stallion
quotes.quote: If you're not going to be confident, I'm going to be confident for you.
quotes.meaning: Providing strength others lack in themselves.

quotes.author: Lizzo
quotes.quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.

quotes.author: H.E.R.
quotes.quote: I want to make timeless music.

quotes.author: SZA
quotes.quote: I'm learning how to be brave in my beautiful mistakes.

quotes.author: Frank Ocean
quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.

quotes.author: Tyler, the Creator
quotes.quote: I wasn't a weird kid per se, I was just extremely sarcastic and socially awkward.

quotes.author: Earl Sweatshirt
quotes.quote: I'll be dead before I'm 25.

quotes.author: Vince Staples
quotes.quote: Life's a bitch, depending on how you dress her.

quotes.author: Childish Gambino
quotes.quote: I refuse to go onstage without looking into the crowd and seeing a reflection of myself.

quotes.author: Chance the Rapper
quotes.quote: Depending on the story, I don't feel that I'm trying to teach anything.
quotes.meaning: Narrative purpose varies without didactic intention.

quotes.author: Logic
quotes.quote: Who can relate?

quotes.author: Mac Miller
quotes.quote: No matter where life takes me, find me with a smile.

quotes.author: Juice WRLD
quotes.quote: Legends never die.

quotes.author: XXXTentacion
quotes.quote: I want to make music that can change lives.

quotes.author: Lil Peep
quotes.quote: I just want to be everybody's everything.

quotes.author: Post Malone
quotes.quote: Just believe in yourself and work really hard.
quotes.meaning: Success formula combining confidence and effort.

quotes.author: Travis Scott
quotes.quote: I'm not making songs for awards.

quotes.author: Playboi Carti
quotes.quote: Cash Carti!

quotes.author: Lil Uzi Vert
quotes.quote: I don't really know how to do anything else.

quotes.author: 21 Savage
quotes.quote: We came from nothing to something.

quotes.author: Offset
quotes.quote: Started from the bottom, now we here.

quotes.author: Quavo
quotes.quote: We some young rich ninjas.

quotes.author: Takeoff
quotes.quote: I just want to be great at what I do.

quotes.author: Lil Baby
quotes.quote: Turned nothing into something.

quotes.author: DaBaby
quotes.quote: Let's go!

quotes.author: Roddy Ricch
quotes.quote: I got it out the mud.

quotes.author: Polo G
quotes.quote: Through the pain, I'm still smiling.

quotes.author: Pop Smoke
quotes.quote: Welcome to the party.

quotes.author: King Von
quotes.quote: Stories I tell 'em is real.

quotes.author: Lil Durk
quotes.quote: The voice of the streets.

quotes.author: Young Thug
quotes.quote: I'm a natural born hustler.

quotes.author: Gunna
quotes.quote: Pushin' P.

quotes.author: Future
quotes.quote: Life is good.

quotes.author: Metro Boomin
quotes.quote: If Young Metro don't trust you, I'm gon' shoot you.

quotes.author: Mike WiLL Made-It
quotes.quote: Ear drummers!

quotes.author: DJ Khaled
quotes.quote: Another one.
